review:
Recommended. Not vulgar at all. Nothing sloppy. Hats off to Radhika Apte. The movie is all about Nature and addiction. Nowhere it showed that the protagonist, being a sex addict, has anywhere been disrespectful, vulgar, or dominating and  assaulting for his habits. He was otherwise simple, submissive and sensitive.
Good to watch.
